EmailTemplate.description: This is the same email as Jan12Webinar-TopThreeQuestionsGoingSolo, but with a different subject line. We are testing hte effectiveness of the subject lines.
EmailTemplate.name: 27Jan12Web:AreYouReadyToGoSolo.Jan12Webinar-TopThreeQuestionsGoingSolo-B
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Webinar: Friday, Jan. 27 at 12:30pm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=aspiring consultant}},
Throughout our many years of working with consultants, we've gained a lot of insight and knowledge about how to successfully transition to an independent work lifestyle. I'd like to invite you to join our webinar this Friday as we discuss your readiness for a solo career. Join Aassia Haq, our CMO and Sara Conde, our Consultant Services Advisor as they discuss the top 3 questions to ask yourself before going solo.
Title: Are You Ready to Go Solo? The Top 3 Questions to Ask Yourself
Date/Time: Friday, 1/27, at 12:30 PM EST
So, the question remains, are YOU ready? Join us and find out. Register now for this webinar - https://www1.gotomeeting.com/register/319302273.
Read more about the webinar, our speakers and what you'll learn in our recent blog post, http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/top-three-questions-ask-if-you%E2%80%99re-thinking-about-going-solo.
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
